document.full_text: at least 17 people were killed after a string of violent storms and tornadoes swept the southern united states over two days, including seven in alabama on friday, officials said on saturday.
document.title: tornadoes, storms kill at least 17 in south
lines_and_colors: at least 17 people were killed after a string of violent storms and tornadoes swept the southern united states over two days, including seven in alabama on friday, officials said on saturday.
